Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.4 Sappaṭighaduka » 2.4.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.4.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Cūḷantaraduka
Sappaṭighaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
91.
750Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi…pe…  nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
751Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
